title: Authorizes granting of city personal income tax deduction for installation of home security devices
summary: Authorizes city with a population of 1,000,000 or more to allow credit, by local law or ordinance, against personal income tax imposed by such city, for expenses of providing security for the home, provided such structure is a one, two, three, four or five family owner occupied residence.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, in relation to providing for the granting of a deduction in personal income tax imposed by a city for home security expenses
